thread.title: Intel, Aiming Beyond PCs, Launches Reality TV Show
thread.title_full: Intel, Aiming Beyond PCs, Launches Reality TV Show - WSJ

author: Don Clark
title: Intel, Aiming Beyond PCs, Launches Reality TV Show
text:
SAN FRANCISCO—Dancing robotic spiders, touch-free vending
machines and reality television: These were among the directions mapped out for Intel Corp. by Chief Executive Brian Krzanich at a company event on Tuesday.
Intel’s foray into television was perhaps the biggest surprise, and a sign of Mr. Krzanich’s determination to bring his... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
